name: Mario Kart Wii Course Description File
summary: Learn about .KMP files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Nintendo originally created KMP files for use in the official Mario Kart Wii tracks; however, fans and modders also utilize them when designing custom courses. The KMP format is divided into multiple sections, with each section describing a specific aspect of the course.

The sections include racer start points, checkpoints, camera placements, respawn locations, and object positions such as item boxes or obstacles. Together, these elements determine how the game engine interprets the layout and interactive features of the track during gameplay.
NOTE: To create the KMP file in the KMP Modifier, select File → New, make your edits, and select File → Save or Save As

instructions: You can open KMP files with KMP Modifier in Windows by selecting File → Open. You can also open and edit KMP files with KMP Cloud, KMP Editor, and the KMP3D plugin for Google SketchUp. The wkmpt tool included with Wiimms SZS Tools can also be used to modify, export, and create KMP files.
